### Getting raw data

```{r}
df.US <- read.csv("../../data/responding/data_US.csv") %>%
  select(-X)

df.CN <- read.csv("../../data/responding/data_CN.csv") %>%
  select(-X)

df.VN <- read.csv("../../data/responding/data_VN.csv") %>%
  select(-X)
```

```{r warning=F}
df.US_demog <- extract_demog(df.US, "US")
df.VN_demog <- extract_demog(df.VN, "VN")
df.CN_demog <- extract_demog(df.CN, "CN")
df.demog <- full_join(df.US_demog, df.VN_demog) %>%
  full_join(df.CN_demog)
write.csv(df.demog, "../../data/responding/data_demog.csv")
```
